name: QrPngCanvasFrameOptions
summary: Decorative frame options drawn around the QR bounds (outside the QR area).

properties.name: GapPx
properties.summary: Gap between the QR bounds (including quiet zone) and the frame.

properties.name: InnerThicknessPx
properties.summary: Optional inner frame thickness in pixels (0 = disabled).

properties.name: InnerGapPx
properties.summary: Gap from the QR bounds to the inner frame.

properties.name: InnerColor
properties.summary: Optional inner frame color. When null, CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngCanvasFrameOptions.Color is used.

properties.name: InnerGradient
properties.summary: Optional inner frame gradient (overrides CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngCanvasFrameOptions.InnerColor when set).
